document.discussion_title: Your musical prayers have been answered: Jennifer Hudson will star in NBC's 'Hairspray Live!'
document.topic_text: Your musical prayers have been answered: Jennifer Hudson will star in NBC's 'Hairspray Live!' How will NBC try to top the awesomeness that was The Wiz? With Jennifer Hudson, that's how. The Oscar, Golden Globe, SAG and Grammy Award winner has been booked to star in NBC's Hairspray Live! — the next chapter in the network's live musical effort, coming in December. She will play Motormouth Maybelle, a part Queen Latifah took on in the musical's 2012 film adaptation.SEE ALSO: Jennifer Hudson and the cast of 'The Color Purple' perform incredible 'Purple Rain' coverMultiple Tony winner Harvey Fierstein has also been cast in the show. He'll take on...
document.post: Your musical prayers have been answered: Jennifer Hudson will star in NBC's 'Hairspray Live!' How will NBC try to top the awesomeness that was The Wiz? With Jennifer Hudson, that's how. The Oscar, Golden Globe, SAG and Grammy Award winner has been booked to star in NBC's Hairspray Live! — the next chapter in the network's live musical effort, coming in December.
